content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/scverse/scvi-tools.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use the official Python base image
FROM python:3.12

# Set the working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Create a virtual environment and activate it
RUN pip install -U uv && \
    uv venv .scvi-env && \
    .scvi-env/bin/activate

# Install dependencies for PyTorch and JAX first. Follow the specific instructions based on the target device, e.g., CPU or CUDA.
# Update these lines to reflect your installation preferences for PyTorch and JAX if necessary
# This step requires manual intervention, as the installation varies based on user's setup
RUN echo "Please install PyTorch and JAX following the provided installation guides before proceeding." && \
    exit 1

# Install scvi-tools in editable mode with development dependencies
RUN pip install -e '.[dev]'

# Run tests to verify installation
RUN pytest

vm_control.OutOfStorage: 
Traceback (most recent call last):

  File "/home/coinse/Documents/lm/spring2024/doctest/vm_control.py", line 160, in build_project
    raise OutOfStorage()
